languages.text: Лидер культа Последнего восхода на Райкаде Минорис, известная под именем Заря, лично возглавила ритуал по осквернению реактора. Она должна быть уничтожена.
The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.
languages.original_text: Лидер культа Последнего восхода на Райкаде Минорис, известная под именем Заря, лично возглавила ритуал по осквернению реактора. Она должна быть уничтожена.

traits.locale_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn, known as Aurora, decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.
The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.
The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

languages.text: Die Anführerin des Kults der letzten Dämmerung auf Rykad Minoris, bekannt unter dem Namen Aurora, hat beschlossen, das Entweihungsritual selbst durchzuführen. Sie muss vernichtet werden.
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Die Anführerin des Kults der letzten Dämmerung auf Rykad Minoris, bekannt unter dem Namen Aurora, hat beschlossen, das Entweihungsritual selbst durchzuführen. Sie muss vernichtet werden.

languages.text: La chef du Culte de l'Aube finale sur Rykad Minoris, une certaine Aurore, a décidé d'effectuer elle-même le rituel de profanation du réacteur. Elle doit être anéantie.
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: La chef du Culte de l'Aube finale sur Rykad Minoris, une certaine Aurore, a décidé d'effectuer elle-même le rituel de profanation du réacteur. Elle doit être anéantie.

languages.text: 小莱卡德的幕后黑手，“终末黎明”邪教的领袖“极光”，决定亲自执行亵渎反应堆的仪式。这位敌人必须消灭。
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: 小莱卡德的幕后黑手，“终末黎明”邪教的领袖“极光”，决定亲自执行亵渎反应堆的仪式。这位敌人必须消灭。

languages.text: ライカド・ミノリスの最後の夜明け教団のリーダーとして知られるオーロラは、自らリアクター破壊の儀式を行うことを決めた。彼女を倒さなければならない。
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: ライカド・ミノリスの最後の夜明け教団のリーダーとして知られるオーロラは、自らリアクター破壊の儀式を行うことを決めた。彼女を倒さなければならない。

languages.text: La líder del Culto del Amanecer Final en Rykad Minoris, llamada Aurora, está celebrando el ritual de profanación del reactor personalmente. Debe morir.
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: La líder del Culto del Amanecer Final en Rykad Minoris, llamada Aurora, está celebrando el ritual de profanación del reactor personalmente. Debe morir.

languages.text: Rykad Minoris'te bulunan Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın lideri Aurora, reaktöre hürmetsizlik ayinini bizzat gerçekleştirmeye karar verdi. Kadının ortadan kaldırılması şart.
languages.original_text: The leader of the Cult of the Final Dawn on Rykad Minoris, known as Aurora, has decided to personally perform the reactor desecration ritual. She must be destroyed.

traits.locale_text: Rykad Minoris'te bulunan Nihai Şafak Tarikatı'nın lideri Aurora, reaktöre hürmetsizlik ayinini bizzat gerçekleştirmeye karar verdi. Kadının ortadan kaldırılması şart.
